author: otaviolima
title: Web3 Marketing Campaigns Platform
description: You no longer need to use tools like Google forms, spreadsheets or any other that doesn't connect to the Cardano Blockchain for your launches, whitelists, marketing campaigns and capture of users.

f6_assessments.q0: Web3 is emerging upon us all and has been a well discussed topic during the last years. The Cardano Feed team intends to deliver a universal marketing and campaign platform for the Cardano ecospace. There are always new and exciting projects or events popping up and the proposed project will help to lower the barrier for many such projects. The Cardano ecospace could gain an even greater impact on the blockchain domain by providing a seamless solution for projects and events. The proposed solution is impactful in that sense, furthermore it is aligned with the “Dapp” challenge setting and the score will be 5 points as a result.
f6_assessments.q1: The team consists of well experienced members with a great background of development, their claimed experience can be further backed up by their LinkedIn profiles, this makes them very credible. Since they already have delivered (their website), the feasibility of the project is high since. Together with the detailed plan that is split up into monthly phases they prove a strong evidence of knowledge about what has to be done in order to successfully deliver the proposed project. Lastly, the budget reflects the plan with reasonable wages. The proposal leaves little to no doubt about the feasibility of the project and the score will be 5 points as a result.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal lists a multitude of great and relevant KPIs with goals that are realistic. Furthermore they provide a definition of success that also can act as additional aspects when evaluating the project. Regular updates about the project's progress will be shared with the community through their own channel (website). It is hard to find any flaws in the auditability aspects of the proposal and they will receive a great score as a result. 5 points.

f6_assessments.q0:
As it currently stands, it's not entirely clear what it is that this proposal is suggesting. A marketing tool to replace various Google tools would absolutely add value to the Cardano ecosystem, but there's not a lot of discussion of how those tools will be replaced on a 1:1 basis. Most of the meat of the Impact statement reads a bit more like an advertisement than a clear presentation of what's being built.

A lot of the impact statement discusses NFTs, which it sounds like will be used to manage ownership of assets on the platform? The proposal needs to draw a more direct, clear line between the problem statement and the feature set of the platform.
f6_assessments.q1:
The roadmap provided by the proposal, in contrast, is very clear and concise with reasonable monthly milestones for a team of seven. Likewise, the budget breakdown gives a clear picture of how much money is being allotted to each position, as well as an adequate idea of how long each position will be engaged with the project. The amount asked for looks reasonable. 

The team is responsible for building Cardanofeed, a news ticker that aggregates Cardano-related news from a variety of sources and various languages. While the UI is a little rough, the site is quite functional and a handy place to see what the media is saying about Cardano. The Cardano ecosystem explorer is a tad on the slow side, but is an effective way to find projects. Overall, these previous projects and the professional backgrounds of the team lead me to be pretty confident that they'll be able to execute this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
Using Cardanofeed to present project updates is potentially a great way to leverage previous work while also making it easy and convenient for auditors to keep up with the project's development. 

While the project does appear to be very auditable, it still needs a bit of work with regard to clarity (see above under Impact). This would help us get a better sense of how appropriate the listed KPIs are.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a very unique proposition that effectively solves the challenge posed by creating a new method of social media. Use this powerful marketing tool to Generate NFTs Unlock Special Campaigns in 5 Minutes. No code needed, plug and play platform. A smart way to get and connect with your NFT or Token customers. While NFTs are often oversimplified as digital art, or “jpgs,” these unique blockchain tokens that signify ownership over an asset are increasingly being used as membership passes, tickets to events, and “keys” that unlock perks.
f6_assessments.q1:
Your team consists of members such as: developers, UX / UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business,... They have all the knowledge, skills and experience to carry out this project. Each has their own forte, they combine to form a perfect team. In particular, they have achieved certain successes: they developed the largest media coverage platform Cardanofeed.com, with more than 1,000,000 monthly visits and also the largest "Cardano Ecosystem" project directory (approximately 800+ projects). Their linkedin link is also specifically listed. With all the information about the team, I believe they can complete this project easily.
The job roadmap (6 months) is listed quite fully and in detail. This makes it easier to track the progress of the work, helping the project stay on track, on the original plan. The budget has been calculated based on the number of months worked and the amount for each month. However, it would be better to calculate a budget based on the number of hours worked, the amount per hour. This will make the budget a lot more transparent. I also want to give you a compliment for listing specific metrics to measure the success of a project. Based on those specific numbers, people can monitor and evaluate the project easily. In addition, the risks, challenges, and ways to mitigate it are also provided by you. This will be a solid foundation to help the project develop comprehensively, reflecting the vision of the proponent.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is complete, people can rely on it to evaluate the success of the project. I personally love this suggestion. "Customize with your domain", "Choose a template or create your own campaign. There is no limit to creativity!" . This makes me feel very interesting, I can customize according to my preferences, bring a sense of personalization, help optimize the user experience. Hopefully in the future, this proposal will be successfully implemented, I am sure it will bring a new value to the community. Thank you!

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal meets the setting of the challenge participants do not need to use tools such as Google forms, spreadsheets or any other tools without connecting to the Cardano Blockchain to launch is a problem this challenge needs to be addressed. It is directly related to the development of the challenge. Well defined solution that using tool to Generate NFT unlock special campaigns in 5 minutes is the solution of this challenge no code, plug and play platform. This is a smart way to get and connect with NFT clients or Participant Tokens. This solution can completely solve the problem of the challenge. The main challenge of the project will be to get the first NFT or Token projects to develop Web3 digital strategies on their website with a platform to manage the marketing strategy. The author is confident that this project will be risk-free from crypto users, as many already understand the workings of Web3 wallets and the use of NFTs.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal describes a clear roadmap and timeline for implementation. The timeline is divided into 6 months by the author, clear and specific goals are listed by the author in detail what to do in the month and also aim to achieve them in a certain period of time. . The progress of the project is also easily trackable through the web links that the author has listed. The success is clearly described by the author as the results achieved are: information generated in real time for website users, amount of shares on social networks, number of websites and project stores with applications , the number of unlocked Web3 experiences, the number of shares on specialized media sites, feedback validation, and platform improvements. This success is linked first to the challenge of the campaigns. The solution to this is that NFTs are often oversimplified as digital art, or "jpgs", these unique blockchain tokens represent ownership over an increasingly sought-after asset. use as membership card, event ticket and "key" to unlock privileges. This solution could solve the present challenge of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2:
KPIs are clearly defined, the proposed future implementation plan is very detailed and complete. Performance metrics are complete and unambiguous.
Authors will provide the community with some kind of progress report as they go along, in the form of a monthly news release on the Cardano Feed, to measure the progress of their proposal.
The author will also provide a board to be disseminated in the Cardano Feed, with the development of the project according to the Catalyst KPIs.
Number of visits to the website: 50,000
Number of websites with apps: 200
Number of sites and projects with Web3 NFT experience: 100
Number of connected Web3 wallets: 3,000
Number of Web3 experiences unlocked: 5,000
With the above indicators show that this is a good project with adequate performance evaluation and measurement indicators. Our team consists of developers, UX/UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business. The team consists of 4 main members working on this project the author seems very experienced and has a strong background: Otávio Lima is Founder & CEO at Cardano Feed, Felipe Barcelos is a Software Engineer and full stack, Gino Matos is a crypto journalist & content editor, Lucas Fernandes is a marketing assistant. The author also outlines what each member of the team has done, they talk about their experiences. their previous experience. They also link attached network links so we can easily follow their projects easily. The funding applied for this proposal is $49,800 less than 20% of the entire challenge budget. The necessary budget is explained in depth and logically in each expenditure. I think if funded this project will be successful.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is to develop a web3 marketing platform. In recent days, we have seen an increase in the usage of NFTs as passes or tickets. The project is built on this idea, to make a fully web3 system for marketing. Since the whole world is moving towards web3, this project will be great use for future businessmen and content creators. “or any other that doesn’t connect to a blockchain” has an effect on the general public only if the people know about the blockchain technology. Only around 7% of the population know about cryptocurrency and NFTs and of which only 3% are aware of the underlying blockchain technology. Therefore, only the fancy features will be the only tool for attracting users without the technical knowledge about the technology. The proposal is in lines with the challenge in hand and is a great deal for already crypto currency users and people in the block chain space.
f6_assessments.q1:
Given the experience and knowledge of the team, the project is highly likely to be successful. A monthly roadmap was provided by the team with a few key milestones per month. Notice that the team is collaborating with 7 additional collaborators. This shows enthusiasm by the team members and the will to work, tough the increase in number of technically challenging projects can become a setback. 
If successful, the platform is pretty much self-sufficient, and can grow on from there due to the monthly fess structure. If the project is a success then more people will be using the platform making 0the platform a sustainable one.  
The budget breakdown was very clear tough I did not get what the role of a product owner is. It could have been better if the team has explained that. A personal suggestion was to give that amount to the marketing aspect of the project. 
Therefore, the plan presented will highly likely be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
The team has promised to provide a monthly progress report for the community to track the progress of the project. This is great as it would help the team is understanding where the team should focus more while implementing.  “We will also provide a panel to be disseminated within cardano feed, with the evolution of the project”. I feel this will be more than enough for auditability. 
The team has chosen the KPI’s and have described what the success of the project should look like well. The number of projects, sites, shares and real time users are a key metric for measuring the success of the project. This is also mentioned in the description of the challenge itself. 
If the team is able to successfully implement the project as presented , then auditing the success will never be an issue, provided the team has put in enough effort in the marketing aspect of the plan.

solution: Use this powerful marketing tool to Create NFTs Unlock Special Campaigns in 5 minutes. No codes required, plug and play platform. A smart way to acquire and connect with your NFTs or Tokens customers.
experience: Our team is composed of developers, UX / UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business and we developed the largest media coverage platform Cardanofeed.com, with more than 1,000,000 monthly visits and also the largest "Cardano Ecosystem" project directory (approximately 800+ projects).
